strings:
<voice_0x01000AE7><se_low>Yangus: I ain't exactly a looker as you can see.
Perhaps that's why people treated me funny everywhere I went. Like I was a thief or somefin'.

<voice_0x01000AE8><se_low>Yangus: I didn't 'ave no place to go and not a penny
to me name, neither, so I ended up goin' back
to the old game.
<voice_0x01000AE9><se_low><center>And that's when I run into the guv 'ere!
<voice_0x01000AEA><se_low>Yangus: Hold it right there!

<voice_0x01000AEB><se_low>Yangus: Who gave you premission to use my bridge,
then, eh?

<voice_0x01000AEC><se_low>King Trode: Premission!? PERMISSION!?
YOUR bridge lies within MY kingdom, you oaf!

<voice_0x01000AED><se_low>Yangus: Wot you on about?
A creepy old codger like you, a king?
Don't make me laugh!

<voice_0x01000AEE><se_low>King Trode: I see your mouth is as vulgar as your face!
Yes, I'M the King! And who exactly do you think YOU are!?
<voice_0x01000AEF><se_low>Yangus: Me? Hearin' my name is enough to make anyone wet their knickers!

<voice_0x01000AF0><se_low>Yangus: That's right!
Yer talkin' to none other than Yangus,
the legend'ry bandit, 'imself!
<voice_0x01000AF1><se_low>King Trode: Yangus?

<voice_0x01000AF2><se_low>Yangus: The one and only! Time to cough up!
You 'ave to pay if you wanna cross my bridge.

<voice_0x01000AF3><se_low>King Trode: The one and only Yangus!?
What a shame there aren't more of you!
Now, kindly remove your one and only self from MY bridge and clear off!
<voice_0x01000AF4><se_low>Yangus: Grrr! Don't push yer luck, you green-faced freak!
<voice_0x01000AF5><se_low>Yangus: I would've let you go if you'd o' kept your gob shut an' paid up, but ya wanna do this the 'ard way, eh?
<voice_0x01000AF6><se_low>Yangus: Eeyaaaagh!

<voice_0x01000AF7><se_low>King Trode: Now, <hero>, my boy!
Now's our chance to cross!
<voice_0x01000AF8><se_low>Yangus: Grrrr... Just my bleedin' luck...!
<voice_0x01000AF9><se_low>Yangus: GRAAAAAHHH!
<voice_0x01000AFA><se_low>King Trode: Now that's what I call just deserts.
<voice_0x01000AFB><se_low>King Trode: As the saying goes, ‘crime doesn't pay’.

<voice_0x01000AFC><se_low>King Trode: Let us carry on, then <hero>, my boy!
There, there, my precious Medea.
Did the bad man scare you?
<voice_0x01000AFD><se_low>King Trode: What are you doing, <hero>?

<voice_0x01000AFE><se_low>King Trode: But he attacked us!
Why the devil are you helping him?

<voice_0x01000AFF><se_low>King Trode: Just leave him!
It's poetic justice!
Nay, divine justice!

<voice_0x01000B00><se_low>Yangus: Th-Thank you, guv'nor.
I thought I was done for...!

<voice_0x01000B01><se_low>King Trode: (Sigh.)
What is the world coming to?
<voice_0x01000B02><se_low>King Trode: Yangus, was it? You can show your gratitude by getting out of our sight!

<voice_0x01000B03><se_low>Yangus: Hahh... Hahh...
Yer 'avin' a laugh!

<voice_0x01000B04><se_low>King Trode: What? Still here?
If you won't do us the favour of leaving,
I'll be happy to provide some encouragement!

<voice_0x01000B05><se_low>Yangus: Mister <hero>!
N-No, guv'nor!

<voice_0x01000B06><se_low>Yangus: I really owe ya!
You saved me life an' ev'ryfin'!
You're the bee's knees, guv!

<voice_0x01000B07><se_low>King Trode: Guv? What is this nonsense!?
Are you a complete imbecile?
This boy is my retainer!
<voice_0x01000B08><se_low>King Trode: If you're in anyone's service, it's mine!

<voice_0x01000B09><se_low>Yangus: Put a sock in it!
I ain't talkin' to you.
<Cap><hero>'s the one who saved me!

<voice_0x01000B0A><se_low>King Trode: Put a sock in...!?
Who do you think you're speaking to,
you, you...good-for-nothing scoundrel!
